mapper.insert: insert into etl_task_status( task_status_id,task_id,task_name,task_group_id,resource, command,log_path,cycle,time_id,status, if_wait,if_recall,if_pre,priority,recall_num, run_num,recall_interval,recall_limit,start_time,end_time, time_stamp,type,cal_dt,freq,owner, trigger_time,wait_code,recall_code,success_code,job_code, running_prio,timeout,concurrency) values( #{instanceId},#{taskId},#{taskName},#{taskGroupId},#{resource}, #{command},#{logPath},#{cycle},#{timeId},#{status}, #{ifWait},#{ifRecall},#{ifPre},#{priority},#{recallNum}, #{runNum},#{recallInterval},#{recallLimit},#{startTime},#{endTime}, #{timestamp},#{type},#{calDt},#{freq},#{owner}, #{triggerTime},#{waitCode},#{recallCode},#{successCode},#{jobCode}, #{runningPrio},#{timeout},#{concurrency})
mapper.select: select * from etl_task_status where status = #{status} and if_recall = 1
select * from etl_task_status where status = #{status} and trigger_time <= #{triggerTime}
mapper.update: update etl_task_status set status = #{status} where task_status_id=#{instanceId}
update etl_task_status set status = #{status},end_time=#{time},job_code=#{jobCode} where task_status_id=#{instanceId}
update etl_task_status set status = #{status},recall_num=recall_num+1 where task_status_id=#{instanceId}
update etl_task_status set status = #{status},run_num=run_num+1,start_time=#{time},end_time=null where task_status_id=#{instanceId}
update etl_task_status set status = #{status} where status = #{originStatus}
update etl_task_status set status = #{status} where status in (#{status1},#{status2})
mapper.select: select a.pre_status_id task_status_id,b.task_id,b.task_name,b.status From etl_taskrela_status a left join etl_task_status b on a.task_status_id = b.task_status_id where a.task_status_id=#{instanceId}
select * from etl_task_status a where task_status_id = #{instanceId}
select * from etl_task_status a where status = #{status} order by running_prio desc,run_num,time_id,priority,rand()
select * from etl_task_status a where status = #{status} and task_status_id like 'pre_%' order by running_prio desc,run_num,time_id,prio_lvl,rand()
